snippet.title: Adelaide switches on high speed internet
snippet.content: South Australian businesses will soon have access to ultra-fast internet after the launch of a state government funded network. Premier Jay Weatherill says internet speeds will be 100 times faster than the national average thanks to the $7.6 million GigCity Adelaide Network, allowing SA to bring innovative high-tech technologies to global markets. Key sites and co-working spaces across the Adelaide CBD will be able to access the network. (C) AAP 2017
